verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He that is in us is greater than he who is in the world. (repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Therefore, I will sing and I will rejoice for His Spirit lives in me. Christ the Living One has overcome, and we share in His victory.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He that is in us is greater than he who is in the world. (repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All the powers of death and hell and sin lie crushed beneath His fee. Jesus owns the Name above all names, crowned with honor and majesty.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He that is in us is greater than he who is in the world. (repeat){/lang-eng}
